function SaveGame( name ) rockFall = rockFall or {} local str = "Nav = " .. serialize ( Nav ) .. "; " local str = str .. "Ambushs = " .. serialize ( Ambushs ) .. "; " local str = str .. "rockFall = " .. serialize ( rockFall ) .. "; "

trigger.Name: trInitSwampBall
trSwampBall
trigger.script:
-- trigger:Deactivate() local TriggerTime = .5 local TimeBetween = 5 local timeRandom = 2 local timeWorkBuble = 2.5 local workDist = 320 local bubbleModel = "waterfall" local bubbleDeathEff= "ET_PS_GREEN_SMOKE1" local explodeName = "BubbleBum"
local veh = GetPlayerVehicle() local v_pos = CVector( 0, 0, 0 ) if veh then v_pos = veh:GetPosition() end
for i, v in SwampBall do v.Timeout = v.Timeout - TriggerTime v.WorkTimeout = v.WorkTimeout - TriggerTime
if v.WorkTimeout == 0 then local bw = CreateNewObject( { prototypeName = explodeName, objName = "tempwave" } ) getObj( bw ):SetPosition( v.Pos ) CreateEffectTTLed( bubbleDeathEff, v.Pos, Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), TimeBetween ) -- local bubble = getObj( v.BubbleId ) if bubble then bubble:Remove() end SafeRemove( v.BubbleId ) end
if v.Timeout == 0 then if workDist > (v_pos - v.Pos):length() then -- v.BubbleId = CreateNewSgNodeObject( bubbleModel, "bbbb_"..tostring( i ), -1, 1101, v.Pos ) v.BubbleId = CreateNewDummyObject( bubbleModel, "compas", -1, 1101, v.Pos ) local Bubble = getObj( v.BubbleId ) if Bubble then Bubble:SetNodeAction( AT_MOVE1 ) Bubble:SetScale ( 10 ) end v.WorkTimeout = timeWorkBuble end end
if TriggerTime > v.Timeout and TriggerTime > v.WorkTimeout then v.Timeout = TimeBetween + random( timeRandom ) end end

trigger.Name: trToxicity

if TimerHack(1, Toxicity) then -- arg is the trigger timeout return end local count = GetVar("ToxicityCount").AsInt local playa = GetPlayerVehicle() local dist if playa then dist = Dist(playa, GetEntityByName("Boss_mimic_zone")) println(dist) if dist>400 then if getObj("trBossToxicGate"):IsActivated() == 0 then playa:AddModifier("hp", "- 10") else playa:AddModifier("hp", "- 60") end
if math.floor(count/5)==count/5 then RuleConsole("g_postEffect DamageIntegrated") AddImportantFadingMsgId("fm_player_toxicity") end
if count>=25 then AddFadingMsgId("fm_player_toxicity_detail") count = 0 end end end
count = count + 1 SetVar("ToxicityCount", count)
